name: Tier 1 Melee Critical Hits (Levels 1-4)
description: Critical hit effects for melee attacks at Tier 1 (Levels 1-4). Effects are relatively mild for novice adventurers.

results.text: Nothing Special - Your critical strike deals damage as normal, but no additional effect occurs.
Knockdown - The force of your blow sends your target sprawling. They are knocked prone.
Dazed - Your devastating hit leaves your target momentarily stunned. They have disadvantage on their next attack roll.
Bleeding Wound - Your strike opens a nasty wound that bleeds freely. Target takes 1d4 damage at the start of their next turn.
Shield Bypass - Your attack finds a gap in the target's defenses. They cannot use their shield bonus to AC until the end of their next turn.
Exposed Weakness - Your keen eye spots an opening. Your next attack against this target has advantage.
Painful Strike - The excruciating pain of your hit distracts your foe. They have disadvantage on concentration checks until the end of their next turn.
Devastating Blow - Your mighty strike deals an additional 1d6 damage from the sheer force of impact.
